content: Prashant Modekurthy, Ph.D. | People | UNLV Skip to main content close Directories menu Directories Directories Home close find region Find Search A-Z Index Directories Quick Links Bookstore Bookstore Calendar Calendar Campus Maps CampusÂ Maps Degrees Degrees Libraries Libraries MyUNLV MyUNLV News Center News Center RebelCard RebelCard Rebelmail Rebelmail Social Media Social Media UNLV Mail UNLV Mail WebCampus WebCampus Loading Directories Home A-Z Index Colleges, Schools, and Departments Administrative Units Research Centers and Institutes Resources and Services Employee Directory Contact UNLV Social Media Directory UNLV Mobile Apps Breadcrumb UNLV Home Prashant Modekurthy, Ph.D. Assistant Professor Department(s) Computer Science Mail Code 4019 Phone 702-774-3405 Fax 702-895-2639 Email prashant.modekurthy@unlv.edu Biography Modekurthy's research interests include Cyber Physical Systems (CPS), Real-Time and Embedded Systems, Parallel and Distributed Computing, Internet-of-Things (IoT), and Industrial Internet-of-Things (IIoT) / Industry 4.0. He has published research papers in prestigious journals and conferences, including ACM Transactions in Embedded Computing, IEEE Real-Time and Embedded Applications Symposium (RTAS), IEEE/ACM Internet-of-Things Design and Implementation (IoTDI), and Euromicro Conference on Real-Time Systems (ECRTS). Modekurthy received his Ph.D. from Wayne State University in 2020 and a master's from Missouri University of Science and Technology (f.k.a. University of Missouri Rolla) in 2015. Research Interests Cyber Physical Systems (CPS), Real-Time and Embedded Systems, Parallel and Distributed Computing, Internet-of-Things (IoT) Related Links Faculty Website Google Scholar
